sect1.title: Anonymous Access
sect1.para: To get anonymous access, simply use the following commands (note that these assume you are using bash or a similar shell. csh users may have to modify the export command): export CVSROOT=:pserver:anonymous@cvs.linuxfromscratch.org:/home/cvsroot cvs login [just press return when prompted for a password] cvs checkout BLFS/BOOK
This will create a BLFS/BOOK directory and copy the current working tree into it. When you wish to update your local copy (often called a sandbox), simply cd into the directory and run: cvs update
